---
id: receiver-payment-initiation-webhook
title: "Payment initiation webhook"
description: "We send a webhook for every change made to the receiver's payment."
sidebar_label: "Payment initiation webhook"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "event api-method"
info_path: reference/open-finance/btg-pactual-banking-as-a-service-openfinance
custom_edit_url: null
proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Payment initiation webhook"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"event"}
  path={"webhook"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



We send a webhook for every change made to the receiver's payment. 
When the request status is ERROR, there will be an errorCode and an errorDescription, which can be:
    

| Error Code | Error Description |
|----------|:-------------|
|PBE304|Data not found|
|PBE304|ConsentId Not Found|
|PCE005|Duplicated ClientRequestId|
|PBE1001|AccountId not found|
|PBE7036|Error on Get Client Parameter|
|PIE002|Error calling internal api|
|PIE001|Invalid request parameter format|
|PBE002|Openbanking integration fail, request unauthorized.|
|PCE427|Invalid Parameter|
|PBE352|Integration request failed|
|PCE400|Request is invalid, Is not a scheduled payment.|
|PCE426|Payment status not allowed for cancellation.|
|PBE1804|Payment Callback Redirect URL is not CONFIRMED.|

You can sign this webhook in the logged area of this portal or via [API](https://developer.btgpactual.com/doccm#tag/Webhook), with the entity ```ReceiverPaymentInitiation```. You can also configure the security validation method for the requests, which can be either ```mTLS Certificate``` or ```Hash Signature (HMAC SHA256 Hash)```.

For more information on the security validation methods, check the ```AUTHORIZATIONS``` section below.

For more information on webhooks, see the [Webhook Documentation](https://developer.btgpactual.com/doccm#tag/Webhook).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

\r\nACSC (Accepted Settlement Completed Debtor Account) - Debit made to the payer's account; \r\nRJCT (Rejected) - Payment instruction rejected; \r\nPATC (Partially Accepted Technical Correct) - Waiting for multiple authorization; \r\nRCVD (Received) - Payment transaction is received to be processed; \r\nCANC (Cancelled) - Payment transaction cancelled; \r\nACCP (Accepted Customer Profile) - Payment initiation accepted and payment available to processing; \r\nACPD (Accepted Clearing Processed) - Payment submitted for settlement, but not confirmed whether it was settled or rejected; \r\nSCHD (Scheduled) - Payment transaction scheduled.","enum":["PDNG","ACSC","RJCT","PATC","RCVD","CANC","ACCP","ACPD","SCHD"],"type":"string","title":"ObkPaymentStatus"},"rejectionReason":{"description":"","type":"object","properties":{"code":{"description":"Payment Rejection Reason Code","enum":["SALDO_INSUFICIENTE","VALOR_ACIMA_LIMITE","VALOR_INVALIDO","COBRANCA_INVALIDA","NAO_INFORMADO","PAGAMENTO_DIVERGENTE_CONSENTIMENTO","DETALHE_PAGAMENTO_INVALIDO","PAGAMENTO_RECUSADO_DETENTORA","PAGAMENTO_RECUSADO_SPI","FALHA_INFRAESTRUTURA"],"type":"string","title":"RejectionReasonCode"},"detail":{"description":"Additional Inforamtion regarding the rejection.","type":"string","title":"RejectionReasonDetail"}},"title":"RejectionReason"},"cancellation":{"type":"object","properties":{"reason":{"description":"Reason for cancellation:\r\n\r\nCANCELADO_PENDENCIA - Payment canceled while in the PDNG situation.\r\nCANCELADO_AGENDAMENTO - Payment canceled while in the SCHD situation.\r\nCANCELADO_MULTIPLAS_ALCADAS - Payment canceled while in the PATC situation.","enum":["CANCELADO_PENDENCIA","CANCELADO_AGENDAMENTO","CANCELADO_MULTIPLAS_ALCADAS"],"type":"string","title":"ObkCancellationReason"},"cancelledFrom":{"description":"Field used to inform the means by which the cancellation was performed:\r\n\r\nINICIADORA - Payment canceled by the paying user on the initiator's channels.\r\nDETENTORA - Payment canceled by the paying user on the owner's channels.","enum":["INICIADORA","DETENTORA"],"type":"string","title":"ObkCancellationFrom"},"cancelledAt":{"description":"Date and time of the cancellation.
